009package ImageJ_Demos;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.gui.NewImage;
014import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
015
016public class Generic_Dialog_Example implements PlugIn {
017        static String title = "Untitled";
018        static int width = 512;
019        static int height = 512;
020
021        public void run(String arg) {
022                
023                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("New Image");
024                gd.addStringField("Title:", title);
025                gd.addNumericField("Width:", width, 0);
026                gd.addNumericField("Height:", height, 0);
027                gd.showDialog();
028                
029                if (gd.wasCanceled())
030                        return;
031                
032                title = gd.getNextString();
033                width = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
034                height = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
035
036                ImagePlus imp = NewImage.createByteImage(title, width, height, 1, NewImage.FILL_WHITE);
037                imp.show();
038        }
039}
